synonyms.synonym: Neuronal voltage-gated calcium channel gamma-like subunit

protein.specific_function: Thought to stabilize the calcium channel in an inactivated (closed) state. Modulates calcium current when coexpressed with CACNA1G

reference.reference_text: Chu PJ, Robertson HM, Best PM: Calcium channel gamma subunits provide insights into the evolution of this gene family. Gene. 2001 Dec 12;280(1-2):37-48.
